TopicTitle: [0.25] Kerbal Warp Drive! Procedural systems from a seed you choose! v1.1.0, 16 Nov.

Articles.Content: Nooooooooooooo!!!! Why do you ruin such a beautiful mod 0.90??? Whyyyyyyyy?????
I will go in the corner and bawl my eyes out. This is a tragedy.

I hope someone can pick this up, because I was looking forward to trying it some day. (the author hasn't been on the forums for a while, so I don't know if they're coming back)

I hope the license would permit this? HOPEFULLY fixing it wouldn't be too hard. I haven't made any KSP plugins (only tiny part mods, and those I kept to myself cause they were stupid), so I wouldn't know.
All of the planet-creation / universe-modifying mods seem to have very short, unstable lives. I wonder why?
If someone either picks up or forks this, talk to me. Interested in collaboration on this one as I have some ideas.
If it's open source, can't it just be recompiled against 0.90?

If someone either picks up or forks this, talk to me. Interested in collaboration on this one as I have some ideas.

It would make me so happy if you Roverized this.
Hey friend, how is it going. Is this totally dead, or some hope of bringing with us to the future?

Necropost!

well sotta but i think this MIGHT be dead. (continues pestering roverdude to take over)

Necropost!

well sotta but i think this MIGHT be dead. (continues pestering roverdude to take over)

I know right? This would be perfect if integrated into his Warp Drive plugin!
It's far off, but if someone could make a procedural texture (it can even be really low quality) for planets, I would lose my mind. Roverdude, please?

Maybe you should integrate kopernicustech into this mod and set it up so there is at least 200 planet templates held in some sort of "ether" that when you jump to a new system the mod will move some of these planets into orbit around the new star and maybe even randomize some values so each planet is noticeably different from its template
when will this be back? who plans on picking this up?

hi I'm remaking this mod, the creator of the mod has given me permission to update this mod to 1.12.3.
you can find the new version here -> 

mods can close this forum/topic if they want.

On 1/19/2015 at 10:03 AM, RoverDude said:

If someone either picks up or forks this, talk to me. Interested in collaboration on this one as I have some ideas.

Hi, I'm new on the forums, so I can't message you. But I'm remaking this mod, and if you want to help or something you can find more info here -> 

or you can email me at [email protected]. I haven't figured out how to randomize the systems yet. But I have updated the mod to 1.12.3, added a new resource and part, and gotten warping to new systems to work as well. 

if you want to see some of my other work for Minecraft look up attack on block on curse forge. I have made one mod for ksp before this mod. Its called the habitator mod.

have a great day!
